column4: i was trying to add an extra 2 workspaces to ubuntu 8.4.. i've tried with the ubuntu workspace switcher.. but it doesn't add any lol
can someone tell me how to add more workspaces
you are most likley using compiz then, which means you need to edit this in the compizconfig-settings-configurator
if you are indeed using compiz then you need to install and modify the virtual desktop settings in the general section using the : compizconfig-settings-manager
